title: Did the U.S. Capitol police officer take a self-image with Ryoter?
subtitle: A well-known white nationalist recorded the video that spread in the chaos of January 6, 2021, the attack on the American Capitol.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: A police officer in the U.S. Capitol showed a photo with a member of the Mafia loyal to Trump who broke into the federal building on January 6, 2021.
